values:
Improvements? 

We took Grandma out of the home today, drank wine by the river, then went and visited grandpa. She loves him so much... its heartbreaking that they cant just be together... but she said this was the "best day of her life" and it was very sweet. But at the end of the day, as we were all leaving, she was bawling. She misses her Jimmy. 

I can't stand the thought of them being in homes... but in seperate homes? It seems too cruel for two people who have been married for 65 years to spend the last part of their lives apart. Gaaaah it boggles my brain and makes me cry. But nobody in our family (myself aside) sees any point in trying to find a solution to this problem. I'm screaming inside... 

... the bell jar. What a depressing book (really not my taste at all) but the concept of the "bell jar" is very real. And it doesn't just apply to young repressed women. My grandparents are certainly trapped inside isolated bell jars.  

- 

Age terrifies me. 

The passage of time terrifies me.  

I'm paralyzed by decisions. I have so much in front of me, and I do nothing.  

Is my relationship damaging my ambitions? Am I doomed to repeat the mistakes of countless women before me? Is "success" a tangible goal? Should I ditch the emotions and haul ass to NYC or Washington, in pursuit of a great career and metropolitan lifestyle? If I dont establish any goals, how can I fulfill them? 

If my goal is happiness, I can achieve that by sitting and watching a sunset with mr. poon. 

Sentimental fool! you'll never get anywhere in life. 

I sent Mikey a message today, and he wrote back almost instantly. I told him I wasn't coming to New York... he told me I should, that airfare is cheap. But he also told me that he is coming to Los Angeles the same day that I go back! I'm excited to see him. We have a ridiculously messy history, but he always makes me smile. God he's such a nerd, but so quirky and charming and sometimes its like he's looking straight into me. He knows me in a way that Nate doesn't... Nate has treated me infinitely better, but with Mikey there was this instant spark. I fell for him right away and though it was completely naive and juvenile and poorly expressed, it was love. It made my head scream. It was like we had this special connection that nobody else could penetrate. I still miss the nights i'd stay awake, just lying in bed with him... no sex, just talking... about hundreds of silly little pointless things that we both loved. Music, books, etc. All of my senses were excited... electric... and though it was painfully brief, he made me feel like the only girl in the world. Nate has never given me that. He's too rational and emotionally undemonstrative. And maybe Mikey was full of shit, but the illusion he created was absolutely lovely.  

But I love Nate. And Mikey is mostly dead to me. The timing was all wrong. Besides, he was manipulative (I probably was too). I think we both hurt each other too much to ever be more than friends. 

and I LOVE NATE. Goddamnit I do. I just wish he was... i dont know... passionate? jealous?? irrational??? i dont know... honestly, I just wish he'd fallen for me instantly. I cant change the past. As for the present- I wish he was more demonstrative with his emotions. When he told me his grandmother had a brain tumor (which we later learned was not the case), I was choked up for a long time, turning my face away, letting quiet tears stream down my face. I couldn't let him see because he was so stoic about it all... or zen? I'm not sure which it is. I'm never sure if he's actually "zen" about something or if he's just covering up his emotions with the guise of zenness.  All I know is that I sure do cry a lot, and I feel foolish for it. 

He lives with me, but he never says "i love you" on his own, its always in reponse to me saying it first. He never gets too angry or upset about anything. And although I keep telling him--Nate, i'm upset about our past, I'm insecure about everything--he doesn't give me the reassurance i'm seeking. He needs to tell me, "to hell with the other girls, you're the only one. You're beautiful, you're everything, I wanted you before I just couldn't say it" etc. When guys talk like that, is it nothing but bullshit? FINE give me the bullshit, give me the illusion, fine fine fine. Just give me something sweet to dream about when you're not with me, because right now all i've got are nightmares about you saying "no" when I ask you out, and you leaving me for your exes, and you cheating on me with random supermodels. 


Oh well. I'll see him tomorrow and i'll try to pull a little more passion out of that boy if I can. 


This post took an unexpected tangent, but I checked my messages as I was writing so there you have it. 


Passion 
is the fashion 
that we wear 
when we are bare 

Baby wont you please take it all off??

Less than 6 months ago, I was wondering when the hell my boy would finally make me his girl.

Now we're all officially moved-in. He's already been living here for 3 months. Once we're done with school, we're moving to South America together. 

And my brain is screaming whhooooooaaa there hold on take a moment think about this stooooooooopppppp. I keep having this little fits of insecurity... freak-outs... over nothing... well, nothing except the past. Always about the past. I cant let it go.

To calm me down from my last fit... he told me he was in this for the long-haul... that he was dating me now because i'm "marraige material". 

... clearly, he's about 10 relationships ahead of me.

but im rolling with it.

The end of fall quarter is fast approaching. I'm trying to balance perfect grades, pointless employment and love. Nate is about to move in with me. For all intensive purposes, he already has. We said we loved each other. I confessed all of my pain from the past 12 or so months. The tearfest didn't freak him out... really, he just seemed happier to know how much I cared. Gah, i'm such a brat. He didn't treat me badly... and at the time, it wasn't terribly painful (not usually at least)... but hindsight fucking KILLS me. Jealousy will be the end of this and every relationship if I dont learn to curb it. Well, i'm doing my best. I trust him now. I'm just butthurt over past bullshit.

Deepbreath. Deepbreath. You love me. I love you.

Do you want to go away with me to South America? Do you want to stay with me in California? Do you want to stay with me? I don't know what to do, I don't want to plan my future without you in it, but its too soon to make any plans together... so i'm ignoring it. Which is silly, I know. I knowiknowiknow. But i've always been independent, i'm tired of the soloact.

I have to stop worrying. About this, about school, about the future. I'm terribly happy right now... I use the word "terrible" being my fragile brain is only capable of understanding happiness in opposition to sadness. Its all wound together in this tight bundle of intense emotion, intensified by the temporariness...

you are home. i must leave. gosh.

Buddhism is a crock of shit.

But Taoism is relatively thoughtful (as far as organized religions go). I like the guiding ethics of compassion, moderation and humility. I like the concept of Tao (flow of universe or whatnot) but not so much Wu Wei: "without action". Taoist philosophy assumes that the universe works harmoniously according to its own ways... "when someone exerts his will against the world, he disrupts that harmony". As far as i'm concerned, the universe isn't necessarily the way it should or should not be, but it certainly is not harmonious. There are definitely some kinks that need working out-- for example, mass poverty and suffering- and people need to take very active steps to deal with this. The Taoist perspective is dangerous because it can be interpreted to mean: "just go with the flow" [of the universe]. 

I argue that mankind's tiny portion of the universe is often very stormy, and we've got to row like mothafuckers to get into clearer waters. And even if, we zoom way the fuuuuuck out, and the macro-universe seems harmonious, its still full of those storms. Anywhere that concious beings are struggling for survival, its gonna be storming. 

Aw geeze im so stoney.

too much boy time. my head is all clogged with gushywushy bullshit.

i'm trying to write my 2-page research proposal for IDS honors. total fucking ineptitude.

last night we drank champagne and watched porn and i gave nate lots of head. been averaging 2-3 times a day for over a month now. maybe i am compensating for emotional deficiencies? gah obviously. im hanging on a four-letter-word, waiting for it like some goddamned fool... the moment that switch went off in my head, i started going crazy. this situation is defective. but whats a girl to do?  

keep busy, thats what.

time to write
then de-wall-paper
then bang my head against a wall
then swallow a gallon of shampoo
woo
fucking
hoo



the lovedrug
is delicious
but its afterbite
too vicious
so i'll stick to
marijuana
and screw whoevs
i wanna

i'm so scared and so confused. i should be happy. i got what i wanted. but the way it  came about was all wrong. too hard. too forced. nate said he was happy this morning, but yesterday he didn't want it. he said he absolutely did not want a relationship. i insisted, because i couldn't really handle the thought of life without him. and i cried. so he said he'd try. my brain was screaming "mistake" even right then. but i'd have felt like much more of an idiot if i had given up.  

its so good. he acts like he cares, he says he cares... but i dont know how much, and i dont know if its enough. i dont know if he was actually willing to give up on us, or if he was counting on me to crumble and stick with an open relationship. 

but i cant. i had to insist. because i love him, i suddenly love every fucking part of him, and i've got to stand up for that. god i should be happy. i asserted myself, i'm finally in a monogamous relationship with a guy i truly care about, and we have so many good times ahead of us. 

... 

but it should have been different. he should have wanted it more. 

...


which is why i'm fleeing to the city tonight, eagerly anticipating drunken debauchery and harmless flirtation.

I'm sho shmitten.

 

But incapable of doing anything productive!! The room i'm sitting in now has been going through remodelling since before I left for Europe. I need to get my shit together and finish it. At least i'm working at global partners now.

Lately, life has been spazzilicious. Maybe its the pot, maybe its the summer sun, maybe i'm a giddy schoolgirl. Yup, smitten. Still as insecure as ever... but sometimes its necessary to shove those insecurities in the back drawer and get on with things. I dont know if shit is gonna work out, but nobody ever does. 

And hey, at least my parents haven't eaten me alive over this car which is, in fact, totalled. $21,000 damages. Daaaammmn.

Baah!

I was so enamoured with the boy this morning that I spaced out, drove off the road, through a fence, over a bunch of boulders and into a field. My parents must think im the worst driver in the world... maybe I am...

It turned out to be a horrible-wonderful day, because after the accident I went back to Nate's, went skinny dipping and pooned until we couldn't poon anymore. Finished it off with an ice-cold hornsby's and a carne asada platter. Mmm. My last post was completely cynical in regards to my relationship with nate, but I cant stay down on him all the time. Today, at least, he really made everything 200% better. 

Of course, as soon as I got home my spirits soared back down into my stomach and everything blew. I fucked up. Pretty seriously. Now its time to deal with the consequences.

I don't want to get over you.
I guess I could take a sleeping pill and sleep at will
And not have to go through what I go through.
I guess I should take Prozac, right,
And just smile all night at somebody new,
Somebody not too bright but sweet
And kind who would try to get you off my mind.
I could leave this agony behind which is just what I'd do if I wanted to,
But I don't want to get over you cause
I don't want to get over love.
I could listen to my therapist, pretend you don't exist
And not have to dream of what I dream of

I could listen to all my friends and go out again and pretend it's enough,
Or I could make a career of being blue
I could dress in black and read Camus,
Smoke clove cigarettes and drink vermouth like I was 17 that would be a scream
But I don't want to get over you.

Looks like i've found a happy new home for internet blogging. Much easier than asking old acquaintances to de-friend my old journal. I'll miss "eversostrange" but hey... I smoke, i'm a poonstress... this handle works perfectly, and it pays tribute to the glory days of cheap wine and wasted birthdays.

So its the beginning of summer. Probably my last college summer. I'm half-in-love, dreaming of europe, and preparing for a new job at a local non-profit. 

No class until October.

Sweet.
